Description: The FHIR Observation resource defines measurements and assertions about a patient, including LDA-W (lines, drains, airways, and wound) data.
SampleResponse:
<Observation

xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="e1CQQb8SWGwdSTExJM-VUIp6Inqjs4Q.8fKCtINxMo1tf2qhgHdLqmpqoMmEJU58r3" />

<status value="final" />

<category>

<coding>

<system value="http://open.epic.com/FHIR/STU3/StructureDefinition/observation-category" />

<code value="LDA" />

<display value="Line, Drains, and Airways" />

</coding>

<text value="Line, Drains, and Airways" />

</category>

<code>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.2.707679" />

<code value="42675" />

<display value="Wound Length (cm)" />

</coding>

<coding>

<system value="http://snomed.info/sct" />

<code value="401238003" />

<display value="Length of wound (observable entity)" />

</coding>

<text value="Wound Length (cm)" />

</code>

<subject>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/ej4nFxzySJAysjMuv4rTBNA3" />

<display value="Meiko Lufhir" />

</subject>

<context>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Encounter/eKzsYGMB9rxAHlrtpROR1iBa2CWjmdcgpdgv8cDE4ZCQ3" />

</context>

<effectiveDateTime value="2018-10-18T16:00:00Z" />

<issued value="2018-10-18T20:49:05Z" />

<performer>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Practitioner/e89p8GCwg7wvke-vxglQ0WA3" />

<display value="Amber Hxl, MD" />

</performer>

<valueQuantity>

<value value="2" />

<unit value="cm" />

</valueQuantity>

<comment value="Not severe" />

<related>

<target>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Observation/ebhUU2Y8Wnz8PEsBIRUDfBw3" />

<display value="HZL Wound LDA Meiko's wound Left Ankle" />

</target>

ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: The read interaction uses the given Observation FHIR ID to retrieve the most up-to-date information about a LDA (details and properties) or a LDA assessment.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
The category is always "LDA".

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

code.Name: code
code.Description:
LOINC code, CADSR code, or encoded flowsheet ID. Either this element or category must be provided, but not both.

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

The code element value varies depending upon what is passed (for example, a flowsheet ID vs. a LOINC code). If using a flowsheet ID, the system value is different between Epic organizations, and it is also different between production and non-production environments for the same organization.

code.Name: code
code.Description:
LOINC code, CADSR code, or encoded flowsheet ID. Either this element or category must be provided, but not both.

The code element value varies depending upon what is passed (for example, a flowsheet ID vs. a LOINC code). If using a flowsheet ID, the system value is different between Epic organizations, and it is also different between production and non-production environments for the same organization.

context.Name: context
context.Description:
Reference to an encounter resource.

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

effectiveDateTime.Name: effectiveDateTime
effectiveDateTime.Description:
The prioritized instant.

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

effectivePeriod.Name: effectivePeriod
effectivePeriod.Description: Start instant and/or end instant of the LDA.

related.Name: related
related.Description: This element can't be modified by the Observation.Update.

target.Name: target
target.Description:
The parent LDA observation FHIR ID.

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

type.Name: type
type.Description:
Always "sequel-to".

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description:
Reference to a patient resource.

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

valueQuantity.Name: valueQuantity
valueQuantity.Description: Value of the assessment. For image rows, a comma-delimited list of external DCS IDs is required.
